name: Castaway on a Weird Island
summary: Your boat is wrecked! Now you are a Castaway on a Weird Island! Castaway is a combination rogue-like and deduction game. Use your clues to deduce the safest path to freedom, or take a risk and fight your way off the island. Many strange creatures block your way, and much treasure is to be found! Castaway on a Weird Island features over 100,000 puzzles and a Game Centre leaderboard.
